snippet: Stocks were little changed after setting records the last few days. Utilities were making the largest gains, while energy fell with the price of oil....
abstract: Stocks rise slightly, continuing rise into record territory.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were little changed after setting records the last few days. Utilities were making the largest gains, while energy fell with the price of oil.

headline.main: Market’s Splashy Advance Slows to a Trickle
headline.print_headline: Market Manages to Eke Out Tiny Gains and More Records
